ch.aplu.android.nxt
Class SoundSensor

java.lang.Object
  ch.aplu.android.nxt.Part
      ch.aplu.android.nxt.Sensor
          ch.aplu.android.nxt.SoundSensor

public class SoundSensor
extends Sensor

Class that represents a sound sensor.

Constructor Detail

SoundSensor

public SoundSensor(SensorPort port)
Creates a sensor instance connected to the given port.

Parameters:
port - the port where the sensor is plugged-in

SoundSensor

public SoundSensor()
Creates a sensor instance connected to port S1.

Method Detail

addSoundListener

public void addSoundListener(SoundListener soundListener,
                             int triggerLevel)
Registers the given sound listener for the given trigger level.

Parameters:
soundListener - the SoundListener to become registered.
triggerLevel - the trigger level where the callback is triggered

addSoundListener

public void addSoundListener(SoundListener soundListener)
Registers the given sound listener with default trigger level 50.

Parameters:
soundListener - the SoundListener to become registered.

setTriggerLevel

public int setTriggerLevel(int triggerLevel)
Sets a new trigger level and returns the previous one.

Parameters:
triggerLevel - the new trigger level
Returns:
the previous trigger level

getValue

public int getValue()
Polls the sensor.

Returns:
the current value the sensor reported: 0 (quiet) .. 150 (loud)
